entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpyp2snkj_\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0011.6820] It is expected that AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax with a value of -2,109,231 reported in the network role http://www.firstbankrichmond.com/20200331/role/idr_CondensedConsolidatedBalanceSheets should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember and a reported value of 2,109,231 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.firstbankrichmond.com/20200331/role/idr_CondensedConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInStockholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax fact are:
Period : 2020-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax : inf Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : inf Rule version: 19.0.0RC5 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1767837/000092708920000320/rmbi-20200331.xml 94
